潨字的基本解释

潨
cōng
水流会合的地方。
急流：“龙潭下奔潨。”
水声：“有声潨然。”

潨
zòng
崖岸；水边高地。

潨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cóng］
［《廣韻》徂紅切，平東，從。］
［《廣韻》藏宗切，平冬，從。］
［《廣韻》職戎切，平東，章。］
亦作“潈1”。
(1)小水流入大水。亦指众水相会处。
(2)急流。
(3)同“淙”。水声。
[②]［zōng］
［《集韻》將容切，平鍾，精。］
亦作“潈2”。
崖岸；水边高处。

潨字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潨； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页650第04
【唐韻】【正韻】徂紅切【集韻】【韻會】徂聰切，?音叢。【說文】小水入大水曰潨。【詩·大雅】鳧鷖在潨。【傳】潨，水會也。　又【廣韻】職戎切【集韻】之戎切，?音終。義同。一曰厓也。　又【廣韻】藏宗切【集韻】【正韻】徂宗切，?音賨。又【集韻】將容切，音蹝。義?同。　又【集韻】仕巷切，淙去聲。與淙同。水聲也。　【集韻】或作灇?漎。

潨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
潨字的起名意思

本意指水流会合的地方，也有水声，水边高地之义。

潨
Basic explanation of words
潨
cōng
Where the currents meet.
Rapids: "Longtan rushes to the bottom of the lake."
The sound of water: "Soundless."
潨
zòng
Cliff shore; high ground by the water.
潨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cóng］
["Guangyun" red cut, Pingdong, from. ]
["Guangyun" Tibetan Zongqie, Pingdong, from. ]
["Guangyun" Job Rongqie, Pingdong, Chapter. ]
Also known as "潈1".
(1) Small water flows into large water. It also refers to the place where all the water meet.
(2) Rapids.
(3) Same as "Cong". The sound of water.
[②]［zōng］
["Jiyun" will be Rongqie, Pingzhong, Jing. ]
Also known as "潈2".
Cliff bank; high above the water's edge.
潨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潨; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 650 04
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Zu Hong cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Zu Cong cut,? Yin Cong. [Said the text] The small water enters the big water and said 潨. 【Poetry·Daya】The mallard is in 潨. [Biography] Han, Shuihui also.　[Guangyun] Rongqie of Rongqie [Jiyun], and the sound ends. The same meaning. Yiyue Ya also.　[Guangyun] Zongzong cut [Jiyun] [Zhengyun] Zuzong cut,? Yinxun. Also 【Jiyun】cut Rong and sound. Righteous? Same.　[Ji Yun] Shi Xiang cuts, groaning. Same as Cong. The sound of water also.　【Jiyun】Or Zuo?
潨
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Japanese Ming Dynasty
Korean Ming Dynasty
Old glyph
潨
Name meaning
The original meaning is the place where the currents meet, there is also the sound of water, the meaning of high ground by the water.
zhōng, cóng
I сущ.
* место впадения притока в реку, устье притока; место слияния рек
凫惊在潨 утки и чайки у устья притока
II звукоподр.
журчанье (сливающихся вод); журчать
潨流 журчащий поток
